text: Ferenc Medgyessy (1881 in Debrecen, Hungary – 1958 in Budapest, Hungary) was a Hungarian sculptor and physician. After graduating in medicine he studied art in Paris, later he studied Michelangelo and the Etruscan art in Florence. His art was dominated by folk realism. ==External links== *Short Biography and works by Ferenc Medgyessy Category:1881 births Category:1958 deaths Category:Hungarian sculptors Category:Artists from Budapest Category:Burials at Kerepesi Cemetery Category:20th-century sculptors
title: Ferenc Medgyessy
